response.overview: A man has only three and a half days and limited resources to discover why he was imprisoned in a nondescript room for 20 years without any explanation.
response.tagline: Ask not why you were imprisoned. Ask why you were set free.
response.title: Oldboy

results.name: OLDBOY - Now On Blu-ray and Digital!
Oldboy - Nothing Is More Twisted Than The Truth [Universal Pictures]
